channel.title: Change into npc when equipping item delta?

item.title: Change into npc when equipping item delta?
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

can anyone give me some hints on how to make a code that does this
if player equips item (ITEMIDHERE) player turns into npc (NPCIDHERE)
i need this to make cars on my server

Read full topic
